generated.css: *,:after,:before{box-sizing:border-box}blockquote,body,dd,dl,figure,h1,h2,h3,h4,p{margin:0}ol[role=list],ul[role=list]{list-style:none}html{scroll-behavior:smooth}body{min-height:100vh;text-rendering:optimizeSpeed;line-height:1.5}a:not([class]){text-decoration-skip-ink:auto}img,picture{max-width:100%;display:block}button,input,select,textarea{font:inherit}@media (prefers-reduced-motion:reduce){*,:after,:before{animation-duration:.01ms!important;animation-iteration-count:1!important;transition-duration:.01ms!important;scroll-behavior:auto!important}}:root{--font:"Work Sans",sans-serif;--color__primary:#000a0f;--color__primary--main:#29363d;--color__secondary:#ffda47;--color__text:#e6e6e6;--color__link:#6cf;--border:dotted 1px #fff;--border__body:dotted 0.2ch #73848c;--border__radius:0.25rem}div.header__logo{font-size:2rem;line-height:1;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:800}div.header__logo span{display:table}h1{font-size:1.875rem;line-height:1.3;font-weight:800}@media (min-width:768px){h1{font-size:2.5rem}}h2{font-size:1.75rem;font-weight:600}@media (min-width:768px){h2{font-size:1.875rem}}h3{font-size:1.5rem;font-weight:600}@media (min-width:768px){h3{font-size:1.625rem}}h4{font-size:1.25rem;font-weight:400}@media (min-width:768px){h4{font-size:1.375rem}}p{font-size:1rem;line-height:1.75rem;font-weight:300;margin-bottom:1rem}@media (min-width:768px){p{font-size:1.125rem}}p strong{font-weight:400}span.highlight{background:rgba(0,0,0,.5);color:#fff;display:inline;padding:0 .25rem}p.p100{font-weight:100}p.p200{font-weight:200}p.p300{font-weight:300}p.p400{font-weight:400}p.p500{font-weight:500}p.p600{font-weight:600}p.p700{font-weight:700}p.p800{font-weight:800}p.p900{font-weight:900}a{color:var(--color__link);text-decoration:none}.header__logo>a.curr{color:#e6db74}nav{display:flex;justify-content:flex-start}@media (min-width:960px){nav{justify-content:flex-end}}nav>ul{display:flex;list-style:none;padding:0;margin:1rem 0;align-items:flex-end}@media (min-width:768px){nav>ul{margin:0}}nav>ul>li{margin:0 1rem 0 .5rem}@media (min-width:960px){nav>ul>li{margin:0 1rem 0 .5rem}}nav>ul>li:first-child{margin-left:0}nav>ul>li:last-child{margin-right:0}nav>ul>li>a{font-size:1.2rem;position:relative;padding-bottom:0}nav>ul>li>a:after{content:"/";color:#fff;position:absolute;right:-1rem;cursor:default}@media (min-width:960px){nav>ul>li>a:after{right:-1rem}}nav>ul>li>a.curr{border-bottom:2px solid #e6db74;color:#e6db74}nav>ul>li:last-child>a:after{content:"";margin-left:0}.callout{color:var(--color__secondary);margin:1.5rem 0}.button{border-radius:var(--border__radius);padding:.5rem 1rem;font-weight:600;font-size:1.25rem}.button.button__link{background:grey;color:#1a1a1a}.post-list .post-list__group{padding:0;margin-top:.5rem}.post-list .post-list__group .post-list__item{list-style:none;margin-bottom:1rem;padding-bottom:1rem;border-bottom:1px solid grey;width:70%}.post-list .post-list__group .post-list__item:last-child{margin-bottom:0;padding-bottom:0;border-bottom:none}.post-list .post-list__group .post-list__item .post-list__item-link{text-decoration:underline}.intro{margin-bottom:2.5rem}.intro h1.intro__heading{color:#ddd;margin-bottom:2rem}.intro h1.intro__heading>span.intro__heading-context{color:#aaa}body{background:var(--color__primary);color:var(--color__text);font-family:var(--font)}body>footer.site-footer,body>header.site-header,body>main.site-main{padding:1.5rem;max-width:1200px;margin:0 auto}header.site-header{background:var(--color__primary);display:grid;grid-template-columns:100%;grid-template-rows:50%;position:sticky;top:0}@media (min-width:960px){header.site-header{grid-template-columns:30% 70%;grid-template-rows:100%;align-items:end}}footer.site-footer{padding:2rem}footer.site-footer p{font-size:.875rem}main.site-main{padding:1.5rem;border-top:var(--border__body);border-bottom:var(--border__body);background:var(--color__primary--main);display:grid;justify-content:center;grid-template-rows:auto;grid-template-columns:100%}@media p:first-of-type{margin-bottom:2rem}.post p:first-of-type:first-letter{font-size:4rem;font-weight:800;margin-top:.25rem;padding-right:.5rem;padding-bottom:.25rem;line-height:.75;float:left;color:#aaa}.post .post__intro>p{color:red}.post textarea{height:20ch;resize:none}.contact .contact__content form button[type=submit]{max-width:15ch;font-size:1rem;border:none}
